javahelpers

Class Input

  • java.lang.Object
    • javahelpers.Input

  • public class Input
extends java.lang.Object
    Container for various methods related to getting input from the user

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean promptBoolean(java.lang.String prompt)

      • promptLine

        public static java.lang.String promptLine(java.lang.String prompt)
        Prompt the user for text input in a popup dialog and read the value entered
        Parameters:
        prompt - Prompt for the user to enter information
        Returns:
        Value entered by the user before pressing [Enter] interpreted as text
